title: Bella da morire
overview: Eva Cantini is a police inspector who returns to the quiet village where she grew up to be next to her sister Rachele, a single mother. Eva, a woman with a strong and determined temperament, finds herself investigating the mysterious disappearance of Gioia, an aspiring showgirl, and with the help of PM Giuditta Doria and the brilliant coroner Anita Mancuso she builds a team ready for anything.
